long_description: A must-have accessory for warm-weather runs or hikes, the REI Mesh Fitness Cap uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric and an inner sweatband to help you stay comfortable when you're working hard. Polyester fabric moves moisture away from skin and dries quickly for cool comfort in warm weather. Built-in sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays; Black and Cobalt colors feature UPF 50+; Fuchsia has UPF 35; White has UPF 30. The REI Mesh Fitness Cap features an internal polyester headband to keep sweat out of your eyes.
short_description: A must-have accessory for warm-weather runs or hikes, the REI Mesh Fitness Cap uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric and an inner sweatband to help you stay comfortable when you're working hard.
